fix: Remove dynamic IconData getter to enable tree-shaking

This fixes the release build error by removing the non-constant IconData
getter in RewardModel. Instead, IconData is created directly from
iconCodePoint where needed, allowing Flutter to properly tree-shake
unused icons in release builds.

Changes:
- Removed icon getter from RewardModel
- Updated rewards.dart to use IconData(reward.iconCodePoint, fontFamily: ''MaterialIcons'')
- Fixes build error: "Avoid non-constant invocations of IconData"
